content.detailedDescription: First sighting took place around 10pm 9/1/2013. exiting home of friends in neighborhood. immediately noticed very bright red glowing light in sky was larger than any other object. about the size of a penny. object was stationary and grew and shrank in size. object changed to a white light and then shrank as if ascending. the second sighting took place the next evening while outside having a bbq right after sunset.There were no other objects in the sky then the bright white light appeared in the sky. the light was stationary and grew and shrank in size for around 12 minutes then shrank and vanished.Was able to snap four photos.
content.summary: Suddenly appeared very big, bright and red. changed size and color, shrank and disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: As i said was looking at all the stars at night , after 10 minutes i thought i saw a shooting star high up in the atmosphere , but this star like light was heading in a straight line going north , i shouted my wife as i was shocked to see this , it was only a matter if minutes when i could no longer see the light moving with the naked eye , amazing
content.summary: 21.36 i was observing the clear sky & all the stars , bright glowing light moving faster than a aircraft very fast

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out of my house on to the patio in front of my house, it was a clear evening around dusk with no cloud. the time was about 8pm saturday. as a smoker i would step outside to smoke as i am not allowed to do so in the house. 
the house i live in is detached with no immediate neighbour but with an excellent view across the river wye to out lying fields.
being on the side of hill, i only have an easterly view from north to south. as i lite my cigarette i notice a cloud forming in the northern part of the sky, my initial reaction was this was an asteroid and it was heading straight for me. i looked in to the window of the house and saw my wife watching tv and decided to leave her be as we were about to be destroyed and i could see no reason to upset her or the children .  i don't know why i thought this.

the cloud got bigger and bigger and eventually started to glow red, this reinforced my opinion of imminent death from this asteroid. the cloud evaporated and all i could see was this reddish glowing object, at that point i knew this was not an asteroid. i was unable to move from the spot i stood and just kept watching as it got bigger. it passed overhead and now i could see it was perfectly round but with an angular tail as long as the width of the big round disc.

the outline was very clear but i could not see the object directly as the orange/red glow was too strong but i could make out the outline. it continued on in the same trajectory and suddenly blinked out of view in the southen part of the sky.

the emotions running through me made met think about why is it i can see this and nasa or ceti couldn't ?

i then remembered i had a mobile phone with a camara (blackberry) so i walked in to the house and set it up to take pictures. about a minute later a second bright orange orb arrived at the exact same place where the cloud first appeared. i took a picture of it but it must have been darker than i realised as the picture shows a reddish object but black all around it.
content.summary: Large circular object with triangular tail glowed orange/red

content.detailedDescription:
Mail was late , went for a drive was in lake florida area. looked up and a enormous three pillars thing that had interconnecting tunnels between the pillars. it was not vertical or horizontal some where in between. was gray blackish in color. looked down at the road to pull over, then looked back up and it vibrated  and was gone.
it was big and looked some distance away. no windows or doors could be seen.

feelings were it did not happen, but i know it did. i thought that there is no way some one could support a thing like this and or construct it in a rural area.
content.summary: 3 interconecting pillers, gray black. pused once then gone. enormus in size.

content.detailedDescription:
On a (moving)greyhound bus in the montana countryside the night of july 31 - august 1, 1975.
on at least two different occasions, maybe 20-30 minutes apart, i saw a moving beam of green light in the distance toward the hills off to my left. it was coming from the ground and traversing the sky. i thought it might have been an artificial device to help aircraft see at night.  i just wonder what it was.
(years later i learned there were notable ufo sightings in montana in mid and late 1975, which added to my curiosity.)
content.summary: Moving green light in the distance, coming from the ground and moving across the sky; at least two occasions

content.detailedDescription: Looking for shooting stars.It came right over me.Never seen anything like it.Big bright ball of light,came from east to west at approx. 200 mph.At approx. 500 ft.In a straight line.What the hell was that? went over houses.
content.summary: Looking for shooting stars, ball of light travelling 1-200mph approx. 500-1000 ft.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the 8-31-2013 monthly launch of the florida spacemodeling assocation at dyer park in west palm beach florida, we were looking sky ward for a model rocket that was just launched whren we first say this object. this objet had to be at an altude of over 25,000 ft. it was far above the clouds that were in the area. someone pointed out that there was also a plane in the same area as the object. then i noticed a small speck
that flashed in the sun. i assumed that was the plane. this object was viewed by a number of people including, a comerical pilot and several usaf cadets.Also one man tried to focus in on the objet with a telephoto lens 
but the objet was so far away that you could not make out the shape.
the reaction to this object was pretty much what is that, a balloon, what?I followed the obnject untill it was gone over the top of a very high cloud.

 if i had to guess i would say that this was something that nasa was testing. n.R.M.
content.summary: This was viewed by 20-50 persons at the 8-31-2013 fsa launch in west palm beach florida

content.detailedDescription: It was aprox 3 am, i was staying at the ashland inn hotel in ashland, ky. i woke up around 3 am, my throat felt like it was swollen and dry, so i moved to get something to drink. i got up got a mountain dew, took a drink and laid back down. as i was about to dose off, a big burst of light filled the front of the room, i saw three entities that were transparent, that seemed to walk right through the wall, then took solid form, then i blacked out, next i remember coming too, and a another big burst of light, i reached for my ipad and started snapping pictures, i was able to catch a photo of one of the entities leaving my room. this is the initial story. after they took solid form, two looked like greys, four foot tall, and the other looked taller, however i couldn't make the entity out, it looked like he had hood ware on, the purples of his eyes were oblong and huge. from the time that i come too, it was 5:15 am.  thanks for your time
content.summary: I was asleep, three entities came into our room, i saw a big burst of light, they appeared

content.detailedDescription: I had gone out on my deck that faces west to watch the last of the sunset and was leaning on the railing looking across the lake at the horizon when i noticed a large star like object moving from south to north just above the horizon, i quickly ran back into the house and told my wife to come quick because i wanted someone else to see the object too, she ran out with me and i said what is that?? we watched it fly across the horizon at time we started to lose the object because of a tree so i ran to the other side of the deck so that i could watch it start to climb very fast and start traveling northwest at a very sharp angle toward the stars, when the object started climbing it took only a couple of seconds till it vanished. i have been watching the sky for many years now because i know ufo's exist but have never seen anything to verify my beliefs, i truly believe me and my wife witnessed something i can't explain.. i wish i had had something to film this event with but it happened to fast
content.summary: Large starlike object yellowish w/red light on top

content.detailedDescription:
In the wee hours of early tuesday, september 2, 2013, i was sitting on my north-facing front steps reading email messages (and playing words with friends) on my phone when i observed what i thought was an airplane with landing lights on coming in my direction. what caught my attention was the single bright light was a yellowish orange color and very bright with no distinct features-airplane landing lights are usually more white light - and my home is not on the flight path for the local county airport. the light/object appeared to hover (though could have been moving directly at me) for around 30-40 seconds, then it changed direction moving slowly towards the east. as i watched, it grew less bright and seemed to very slightly lose some altitude. to my surprise a small round glowing piece (of something) dropped off of the light/object. the glowing piece dropped straight down as the bright light/object continued to slowly move eastward.
the light/object then drifted behind the top of a tree, but when it reappeared i saw another glowing object dropped straight down from the light/object. neither glowing piece seemed to have any sideways momentum as if they were dropped from a moving vehicle... they just went straight down from the point they were released. they also dropped at a greater speed than the light/object was moving horizontally
after the second piece dropped, the light/object changed color from the bright yellowish-orange to more of a bluish white and it dimmed appreciably. i had the impression that it kind of a banded structure coloration with bands of light-bluish and white light. (the light/object also seemed  to be fairly spherical.) as the light/object changed color it also began to lose altitude. it then passed out of view behind trees and the hillside. i noted the time to be 1:05am.
the time that the light/object took from when it changed direction until it disappeared from view also was maybe 30-40 seconds.
through out the observation i heard no noise from the light/object, nor did i see any smoke or emissions.
about an hour later i also observed a set of three individual flashes of bright white light that flashed with a pause of about 6-8 seconds between. these small point flashes appeared higher above the horizon in what seemed to be a triangular pattern. i thought they could be a very high altitude airplane, but there was only single point of light in each flash, not a cluster of several lights (and not in a typical flight path that i have seen before.)  and to my surprise (again) there was a dim flash of light (like a shooting star) only it went up towards where i had observed the three light flashes. connected?? coincidence??
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering bright orange-yellow object then moved slowly, at least 2 glowing objects dropped from it. color changed to blue-white.

content.detailedDescription:
I want to start by stating a few things.  i have lived next to major international airports, small municipal airports, executive airports, air force bases, and the national guard.  i have observed just about every type of flying craft in the air at one point or another, including satellites, weather balloons, high flying flocks of birds, launched spacecraft, military jets, bombers, etc. and feel that i am able to recognize something out of the ordinary in the sky.  i also have spent most of my life in the desert southwest of the usa and have seen my fair share of military aircraft, both experimental and not.  i am an astronomy buff and a photographer.

i was driving to a store, travelling almost due west.  i am always looking up at the sky watching the approaching and departing planes coming to and from henderson executive airport and mccarran international airport.  this night i had been watching the planes on approach as where i was driving they both had approaching planes coming in pretty low and there were quite a few due to the upcoming weekend and holiday.  i noticed an object much higher than a plane due to the fact that it first appeared by becoming visible by fading from a deep orange-red to a yellow-white light in about a second.  since i have seen a lot of these objects in the skies over vegas i watched knowing it would most likely do something odd.  once visible it moved to the right a bit (south), stopped, then moved to the left (north), and stopped again (these objects always remind me of bugs in the way they move and dart around).  i had been approaching a red light as i watched this, so i grabbed my iphone and began recording video once i had stopped (fair warning, mute sound on the video.  my stereo was cranked and i didn't have time to turn it off).  at this point the object began to move slowly to the east (going from about 80 degrees west to almost directly above me at 90 degrees).  it seemed to slow and pick up speed.  once the red light changed i quickly pulled over and tried to spot the object again, but in the twenty seconds it had taken me to get off the road it had already vanished.

video notes:  the object is located in the middle of the screen, slightly towards the bottom when the video starts.  there is a visible star in the upper right corner that you can use to track the object against.  again, mute the sound.  i had my stereo blasting and had no time to turn it down as i was recording while stopped at a light.  my apologies for the quality.  this was taken with an iphone.

when i first starting seeing these objects (sometimes individually, sometimes in groups) it really freaked me out.  i first saw them in a group late at night and their behavior truly reminded me of bugs.  las vegas is a very heavy light pollution area, so when you see what look like stars (except they don't twinkle) moving around very slowly in various directions, stopping, then moving in different directions, you notice.  since then i've been trying to record video and images of the objects i see (including others of different descriptions, including a few odd ones during the day on 8/9/13 and 8/10/13).  i've obtained a very nice dslr and telephoto lens and have purchased a tripod for my iphone to help assist in capturing video.  a new camcorder in also on my list.  i'd say about half of my sightings have been witnessed either by my boyfriend or someone else in the city (as i've confirmed by seeing other peoples' reports after the fact).  i don't really get freaked out anymore because this has been so common.

i have five images from much earlier this same day of another of these objects moving across the sky at about 4:45am.  i was using my new dslr and telephoto lens to take pictures of the stars and noticed one moving from east to west (i was facing nnw). i was lucky enough to have the camera already on the tripod so i quickly snapped a few shots.  as this is unlikely to be the exact same object, i will submit these images in a separate report.
content.summary: Solid yellow light (no blinking) appeared, traveled side to side then straight away

content.detailedDescription: It was around midnight at my home. i went out to the back patio to smoke a cigarette and was just looking up at the sky as i normally do. i was just looking at the thin cloud cover wondering if we where going to get some rain then spotted what first looked like a shooting star directly over my head so to speak but then realized that it was traveling much slower that most meteorites that i've ever soon. it appeared to be staying at the same altitude it was slower than a meteor but faster than any plane. i am reporting this because it was just so bizaare. there was some very thin clouds but you could still see alot of stars i lost sight of it cause of the tree's in my yard to the west it was just really cool ....
content.summary: I was just standing out on the back patio and was looking at the stars......

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were backing out of our driveway on our way to the park to walk our dog. i happened to look up and observed a bright light hovering over chandler, az over our neigborhood. the light was so bright it looked like i was looking at the light from a welding torch. it first looked like the planet venus, then it got brighter and bigger. i noticed it started to move along a path. i ended up at tumble weed park in chandler and got out of my car. i looked up due north and saw that it had moved and it was now closer to tumble weed park but the elevation was higher. it then hovered for about 5 minutes. then it started to turn orange then in a minute it turned bright red. then, it turned back to the original bright white light and started to ascend up so high that it finaly looked like a very distant star. it vanished right after. i tried to call the chandler municipal airport tower control but i got the recorder stating that they were closed as today is labor day. i called phoenix sky harbor and reported my findings while it was turning orange/red. i saw the same type of sphere/light on sept. 11, 2009 around the same time 7:00-7:40 pm in apache junction. i felt frustrated that i could not videotape the object especially when it changed colors and ascended  vanished so quickly.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light changed colors and moved

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the back yard at my girlfriends parents in the hot tub(945-1015pm) looking up at the sky (i always look at the sky late at night in the hot tub)

i first noticed a flash of light followed by another flash, i noticed it very well but thought nothing of it, had to of only been a few 100 feet off the ground, i just passed it up as an airplane.

not more then 15 mins later (girl friend had gone inside in the time frame from the first spotting to the second) i saw it again, looked like a star flashing, i kept watching to see if it had a pattern like an airplane strobe.
flashed once... twice...Three times then it completely disappeared.

the pause between flashes was random, not in unison like an airplane

flashes were like:   flash........Flash...........................Flash
the time frame in between the second and third flash was long enough to almost make me think it was gone but it flashed that last time and i did not see it again.
content.summary: Flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: I visited a flat approx. 200 ft. from my house on the hill behind where i live on wednesday august 14th and saw nothing unusual. the next morning i visited the same area and noticed a circle with a purplish tint approximately 10 ft. in diameter. it remains today after 3 weeks from time it first appeared. my neighbor said he saw a bright light above the hill on the night of wednesday, august 14, very late that night when he drove home. he said the light came over and eveloped his truck inside from above. i have taken and preserved a sample of the "purple dust" that still exists on the grass leaves.
content.summary: Observed a purple circle of 8-10 feet diameter on flat area of hill behind my house

content.detailedDescription: Gorilla camped just west of mt. adams at ~5k. clear, open area with fire pit facing the mountain. no moon--many stars; milky way, et al. my two friends and the two children all went to bed. i was alone in the element. woke just after midnight, and without my glasses could see a bright light in the sky. grabbed my glasses and looked west. a very bright rectangular shaped object was ~8-10k hovering, moving left, then right, but with curved angles, nothing sharp. this was not an airplane or satellite. moved eastward almost out of range then moved back to its original position. was stationary for a while then started up again. felt frightened but did not want to call the others--did not want to move. afraid i would be spotted. the light then became stationary and i waited for about 45 minutes but it did not move again. later in the night the dog woke my friend's daughter. dog was trembling and defecated in the tent. my friend george said this was really strange behavior for the 10-year-old beagle. went back to sleep. thought i slept until morning but the stars were still out. woke up several times. urinated 4 times during the night though i was not drinking anything after 7 pm. i did not have any drugs or alcohol in my system. then my left ear started making strange noises, clicking, and sounds like morse code. this went on for a while. to make a long story short, in the morning all three adults had highly disturbed sleep. all three of us had felt frightened, though the two adults did not know what i saw until after i heard their stories then i told them what i had observed between 12 and 2 am. it was a strange site where we camped--we heard several strange noises in the forest, none that we could recognize and the two adults are from here and have been climbing these mountains all their lives. we all felt like the night was much longer than usual and all three of us felt like morning was never going to come. we packed the camp up and left by 9:30 am. all of us feel strange and exhausted. i especially feel uneasy as i am not afraid of too many things but this experience did frighten me and my senses seemed out of whack.

I left my office which is directly across from phoenix-mesa gateway airport. as i walked to my car, i noticed a group of 3 bright lights in the sky. normally i'd just assume that it was an airplane. however this was different; the object remained stationary. est. time stationary was 5-7min. the object hovered then slowly just dissipated, but did not move. there were no clouds in the sky where i observed the lights. from what i could see, the lights made a triangle pattern, and vaguely you could see what looked to be some sort of wings coming from the side of the object. very strange as there were no stars in the sky and not on the direct flight path to the airport. i tried to  take a picture but strangely my phone would not power on.
content.summary: Stationary opject with 3 bright lights hovering over

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my pattio,smoking a cigarette.When out of the corner of my eye i saw a red light.At first i thought it was a heli,so i got up to get a better view.Thats when i noticed there was no sound coming from it.And then i saw a second red light a little behind the first,kinda like a wing man would.I watched the two for about 20 seconds,when i noticed a third. all came from the southwest,headed east.Untill it appeared to me as they got past the town,changed dirrection headed southeast.I was just excited to see three ,flying red orbs,kinda low,and completly silent!They just kina faded away the farther they went.
content.summary: I was outside smoking,and out of the corner of my eye i saw a red light,coming across the sky.Then another alittle behind first,approx. 20 sec. a third.No sound at all.Under clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Just before sundown i saw a relatively large light in the north sky. too big for a star 5x the size of a star. i got my binoculars and saw it was made up of three balls. one on the bottom and two on top with a small space between the top two spheres.It didn't move for 15 min. then it started backing off and turning gold to yellow. then it got smaller and smaller until it was gone. my step-son and wife saw it also. if you have any questions you may contact me.
content.summary: Three lobed white object stationary in sky. viewed for 20 min.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were standing outside we seen a bright star like object hovering avove the field but not high enough to be a star and not blinking like an airplain we stood there for aprox 10 mins came back inside for aprox 10 mins went back outside where there was a red light but further away the white lite was gone we stayed outside watching the object for 30mins when an airplane got close to it the light compleatly disappeard we stood there as tge plane went by when the plane passed the red light reappeard but closer to our house kept getting closer and closer until another airplane started coming close to the house and the object disappeard into thin air agian and never appeard agian... iam soo shaken by what i have just witnessed i can barley breath :/
content.summary: White light close then disappeard compleatly reappeard farther away with red lights dimmer airplane came close and dissappeard agian into thin air

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from shopping, turned left onto weeks road from bayshore road in my car. saw the object in front of me to the west. pulled onto deer lake drive to observe (my girlfriend was present). watched the object move seamlessly from west to north/nne. object was solid orange, oval shape. video taped object for apprx 1 min. event occurred for apprx 3 mins. object just blinked out and was gone. object made no noise. the object was apprx the size of a pill and traveled in an arc-like direction. event occurred at apprx 814 pm and ended apprx 816 pm when it blinked out. i was a radar repairman in the marine corps for 8 years, i am very well versed with aircraft and as far as i could tell, it was certainly not a plane or helicopter. it was self-propelled and not under the influence of weather or wind. i was unable to determine actual size or altitude.
content.summary: Solid, orange, oval shaped moving w to n apprx 3 min then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: This took place in olean, ny at about 8:30 pm.  the object was a circular fireball that had a lateral trajectory.  it was not a meteor or shooting star--it was large and beneath the clouds.  at first, i assumed it must be an airplane or helicopter's light.  however, as i looked closer, it was clearly a flaming ball of some sort.  i've seen fireworks of all kinds and have never seen anything like this.  the object, again, had a steady trajectory across the sky and did not lose velocity or brightness.  i lost sight of the object when it went behind the treeline behind my home.
content.summary: This was a circular fireball that had a lateral trajectory.  it was not a meteor or shooting star.  this was large and beneath the clouds at night.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I just came out of my apartment to walk my dog. i looked up at the sky; i saw stars, helicopters, lots of planes.....Too many planes. i live right by john wayne airport, i'm used to air traffic. i saw 4 or 5 groups of 3 lights in a triangle. the lights were red, pulsating, almost to an orange red, and back to red. they started to move further away slowly, so i headed to another street for a better view. when i got there, only 3 lights were left, 2 fading fast. my dog stopped to pee, so i turned to look at her for a split second, and when i looked back at the sky, the last red light was gone.
content.summary: Red lights, triangular, pulsating
content.locationName: John Wayne Airport or fur, California

content.detailedDescription: i was out at the smoking area to the south of the john deere  davenport works plant,located at i-80 & us-61.Aproximatly 7/12,10:30 pm. all i can say, is two cylendars extreamly large in size passed over,going from one horizion to another, in two , to three seconds each, going north, to south, the path they travled, it was like the air was burning behind them, a blue glow for a few second more.
content.summary: Two large cylendars, going north to south, directly overhead, one horizion to another,only seconds.Blue fire trails forseconds more.

content.detailedDescription: Wife was standing outside and observed a dark object moving across the sky from the back on our house. i was in the shower at the time and wasn't able to observe the object. she was sure what the object was because she couldn't see any lights of hear sound. we do live west of the airport and a lot of planes fly over, but this object was dark with zero lights and sound. she said that it was a dark blimp looking object moving from the south and heading northeast across the sky. it didn't have any lights or windows that she could see. the object moved out of sight behind trees that are located to the north of my property.
content.summary: Black mass moving across sky heading ne

content.detailedDescription: Last night (sept.1st) at around 9pm mst, myself, my mother and two friends observed 4 red orbs coming from the south. they were at airplane level, but were very unsteady in their flight. these orbs showed one at a time, after one orb headed west and lights shut off, the outline of the object was still slightly visible. then it disappeared. then another would appear to ascend from the south and do the same thing in a slightly different travel pattern, still pulsating and dimming and changing in direction. as if it was "wiggling" it's way across the sky. they weren't flares nor were they any sort of firework. there was also no accompaning sounds or sounds as they dissapeared.
content.summary: Red orbs ascending then dissapearing

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were leaving fairburn agate bed driving in a westerly direction when i noticed a bright yellow glowing  object the shape of a disk or eye. i pointed it out to my wife and she thought it was a plane. later after talking my wife said it appeared silver or grey and was the exhaust from a jet. when i first noticed it i thought perhaps it may be a comet but had not heard of any potential comet in the sky and the position it was in, approximately 35 degrees above the horizon, others should  have seen it for days. it appeared to remain the same size for about 15 minutes then it slowly diminished in size before we lost sight of it from the black hills. i was excited, i often allow my emotions get carried away, because i am always hoping to see a ufo (i had another experience a few weeks earlier while in pine ridge but this object entirely different. i will send another report). my wife appeared only curious (perhaps it was because  she saw it in a different color). after it disappeared we did not see it again. i took several photos with a phone camera and only one   picture shows an object in the sky, the diamond shape dark spot. i tried to zoom in but it became even more distorted. i have attached two photos taken within minutes of each other. the object appears on the right side of the photo above the flat hill next to the clump of trees. my spouse still says it looks like the exhaust from a jet illuminated by the sun, however she also says the object never changed shape or size until it disappeared. we considered whether it was headed due west in a straight line but the disk shape did not change size or position or reflectiveness until it began to disappear. although with the naked eye the object remained still and hovering, the second photo taken within minutes or even seconds of each other, it does not appear in the photo.
content.summary: Observed what appeared to be a bright yellow light that was in the shape of an eye or disk. it appeared grey to my wife. appeared stationary then slowly disappeared. took photo but appears diamond shape dark spot. only came out on one photo.

content.detailedDescription: I was in winnipeg, manitoba at approximately 10-10:30 walking my dog, around the paddington area. i noticed the object flying too low to the ground to be an airplane or a helicopter. as i looked around there was an airplane not too far from the crafts that i noticed; as airplanes blink red and blue this craft did not; as well as not make any noise what so ever. the objects were beaming red with a dash of orange; and the lighting was a constant red and light orange. i noticed one object, then not far behind another object. not too long after that i noticed there was at least 5 object all going in the same direction in a straight line. i then noticed a formation of the 3 objects in a line facing upwards in the sky, they stayed there for at least 30sec to a 1 minute in length then took off again in a straight line heading towards hwy 59. south of the city. i lost sight of them due to the fact of me being a little freaked out and because i couldn't catch up to them by foot. it seems as though they were headed towards the south end of the city towards hwy. 59 and south perimeter.
content.summary: Beaming low falshing red lights hovering above city!

content.detailedDescription:
At 8 pm, me and my husband saw two unidentified objects - bright orange colored, sphere-like, which were moving n-e in about 5-7 km height from ground at the distance of 15-20 km from us. we were walking our dog when i suddenly spotted those two objects gliding over the sky. those objects were bright orange constant lights... we concluded its not airplaine, helicopter, glider, ... anything we saw. later that evening we heard six more people talking about the event. unfortunately we didnt bring our cells to take photos or videos of it...
iam astronomer and i can surely tell it was not a comet, asteroid or meteor....
content.summary: Two strange orange colored lights, not identified like something which was made by humans, were flying

content.detailedDescription:
i was taking lunch outdoors near goodyear lake setting were i had been setting for the past week and a half. it was a perfect day the sky was clear and blue. i was watching the jets fly over, like i always do when, right in m field of vision something caught my eye. right in front of me. it seemed to just phase in as a gary/silver slit in the sky and then it banked to the north. as it banked to my left got a good look at it. it was a silver gray disc. the disc then leveled out and all i could see was it's profile, like a silver tube. the object was traveling at a high speed, but not to the point that i could not follow it. the object then proceeded to travel about 20 second of arc in the sky banked to my right , were i got another good look at the disc shape. the object then proceeded to repeat this wide s shape pattern 1 and 1 1/2 times. back and forth. as it returned for the last s shape pass heading south it simply vanished, just as it appeared. the whole event lasted about 10 to 15 seconds. it happened in my direct view against a clear blue sky. i have a cell phone with a camera, but i could not get it out fast enough nor did i not to loss sight of the object.
     my reaction was complete excitement. i sat in my chain for a half an hour hoping that the object would reappear, but nothing.
     i have been an amateur astronomer for most of my life and have my head pointed to the sky when everyone is looking down. i never jump the gun to say something is a ufo. i understand that there are many naturally occurring phenomena. this was not one. in my lif time i have had five encounters with, what i know have been ufo sighting, but this is the first time i have reported it.
content.summary: Disc shape appeared in cloudless sky banked to left than proceeded to do 1 1/2 s shaped pattern than vanished.
